column5: This is our halfway point and was wondering where I could get a list/info on hotels/motels in and around this area? Don't need a 5 star place, just somewhere to lay the head and not have to worry about the equipment out in the trucks. Thanks for all the help/info.
Go to the Northern Ontario Site at http://www.getnorth.com and go to the WHERE section and pick Marathon and it should give you all of the options for it.Good LuckCrawdaddy
For groceries and meats go to D&H Foods right on Peninsula Rd.
There is a Best Western at Marathon.
We stay at the Zero-100 inn and find it reasonable and clean. It is lasted in Crawdaddys link. Good luck.
Hi there,The Zero-100 is just fine to stay at. Clean enough and comfortable.
